titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Yemeni voices in America [videorecording] : the story.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Yemeni voices in America [videorecording] : the story.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Title from disc label : Yemeni voices in America : a documentary film

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Produced by, Yemeni American Net; produced and directed by, Rasheed Alnozili.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Creator on disc label: Yemeni American News.

archdesc.scopecontent: "This unique film highlights some of ... extraordinary [Yemeni] Americans... The film features Dr. Rashid Abdu, the first Yemeni American physician, Welayah Alhaiki: one of the first Yemeni American teachers, Helal Anozili: a student inspired by Dr. Abdu's accomplishments."--Container.
